page.title: 09FARMING _SHERIFFSTON FARM
page.content:
Annual report by Managing Tenant Mr N.Shaw with F.Shaw,A.Graham,A.Roger
Sheriffston Farm has been in the Black /Shaw family for many years.Mr Shaw has farmed there for the past twelve years.{ { {Cattle Report_ Autumn:New calves bought aged 6-12mths
Winter:200 Shorthorn, Hereford and Black cattle kept. Fed on silage, hay and bruised barley.
Summer:50 cattle kept, mostly Black, for fattening and dung. Others slaughtered at 10-12 months for butcher meat or sold at 16 mths to dealer. No set sale weight. Meat-marketing only just pays. Annual vet's bill is around Â£400.00
